data.name: Thorny Herb
data.story: While walking through the forest, you come upon an herb surrounded by thorny bushes.
data.retreatText: Look for something safer down the way.

data.name: Beautiful Vista
data.story: You come upon a clearing with crystal clear water. The beautiful sight is particularly inspiring.
data.choiceBText: Use the inspiration to fuel a potion idea

data.name: Fountain of Youth
data.story: While walking through the forest, you pull back a branch and see a strange fountain that practically vibrates with power.
data.choiceAText: Take a sip from the fountain
data.choiceBText: Bottle some of the water for use as an ingredient

data.name: Failed Explorer
data.story: Before you lies a corpse entangled in thorny vines, which writhe as they move to cover the remains. In the corpse's hands is what appears to be a potion, and on the ground nearby is a small bundle of herbs. You only have time to take one before both are drawn into the mass of vegetation.'
data.choiceAText: Reach across the vines for the potion recipe.
data.choiceBText: Grab the herbs before they can be swallowed into the mass of vines.

data.name: Grave Robbing
data.story: Deep in the forest, you find a small grave. Planted around the grave are several herbs, and the headstone is decorated with a few small gems.'
data.choiceBText: Pick the flowers planted around the grave

data.name: Wild Animal
data.story: While picking herbs, a wild animal comes up behind you. With no time to plan, what do you do.
data.choiceAText: Fight it off and collect everything
data.choiceBText: Make a run for it with what you have

data.name: Unidentified Herb
data.story: Growing off a vine is a flower you've never seen before. Just holding it in your hands you can tell it is a potent herb, but you have no idea what to use it for.
data.choiceAText: Taste a small bit to identify it
